divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my job noticed two people looking up I joined them and observed a sphere like object hovering slowly in the sky then suddenly moving then stop a picture I have shows the object shining silver The object was sitting motion free then suddenly turn move then stop
trends: There has been one other sighting in Bronx
There were no other sightings in Bronx on or around August 22nd 2012
Summary: sphere like object silver hovering silently over Yonkers ny
